text: M21 is a Ukrainian international highway (M-highway) which connects Zhytomyr and Vinnytsia to the border with Moldova.Ukraine International Highways in Russian The highway also connects two major transnational corridors, Pan- European Corridor IX and the transportation corridor "Europe-Asia". The entire route is part of European route E583.European Highways in Russian The section from Zhytomyr to the Belorussian border was previously P28. ==Route== {| class="wikitable" style="margin-left:0.5em;" |- !Marker !!Main settlements !!Notes !!Highway Interchanges |- |0 km |Zhytomyr | | • |- | |Vinnytsia | | |- |220 km |Mohyliv-Podilskyi / Border (Moldova) | |Border checkpoint |} ==See also== * Roads in Ukraine * Ukraine Highways * International E-road network * Pan-European corridors ==References== ==External links== * International Roads in Ukraine in Russian * European Roads in Russian Category:Roads in Ukraine Category:Vinnytsia Category:Zhytomyr Category:Mohyliv-Podilskyi
title: Highway M21 (Ukraine)
